title: MT61306: Mechanical Processing Of Steels - Quick Facts
text:

Course name | MECHANICAL PROCESSING OF STEELS
Offered by | Metallurgical & Materials Engineering
Credits | 4

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Terminologies related to forming and background concepts; Fundamentals of metal working. Generalised description of forming processes. Forming operations for long products. Forming operations for sheet products. Defects in formed steel products. Controls in forming operations. Effect of forming on property evolution. Computer simulations related to forming operations
